title: Elementary Math Problem-Solving Enhancement Program Using Metacognitive Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with real-time interactive platform integration

learning_goals: Learners can apply metacognitive strategies (self-questioning, think-aloud) with over 80% accuracy during mathematical problem-solving
Learners can visualize problem-solving steps using concept maps for given mathematical problems
Learners can complete a three-stage metacognitive reflection process (self-evaluation-revision planning-reflective journaling) at 100% after problem-solving

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
